description.name: One way valve for air compressors
description.long_desc:
Advantages:ápetrol does not áback from the suction hose therefore the pump has bigger power to generate suitable pressure and suck petrol.á

Valve is finished with a metal protective filter which protects pump against getting dirty petrol into the device.á

description.name: 100L Oil Lubricated Air Compressor V-Twin 9 bar 390 L/min BIG
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Cast iron & aluminium V-Twin cylinder air compressor pump

  • 100 litre receiver capacity

  • 9 bar maximum working pressure

  • Oil sight glass

  • Hi-flow belt guard


Technical Data



  • Voltage: 230V

  • Power: 3,0 KM

  • Maximum Delivery: 390 L/min

  • Maximum Air Pressure: 9 bar / 130 psi

  • Tank Capacity: 100L

  • Tank Material: Steel

  • Tank Style: Horizontal

  • Number of Wheels: 4

  • Drive Type: Belt Drive

  • Lubrication Type: Oil

  • Decibel Rating: 92 dB(A)

description.long_desc:

description.name: Pressure switch reducer /2 manometres/ 400V
description.long_desc:
Pressure switch - reducer á/2 manometres/ 400V
Technical data:
Power supply 380/400 volt, 3 phases
Amperage 20a
High quality
Automatic turn on 6 bar
Automatic turn off 8 bar
Automatic turn off can be switched to 12 bar
Built-in decompressor
Integrated reducing valve
2 manometers
2 quick connectors
Safety valve

description.name: Industrial Electric Fan Heater 2kW
description.long_desc:
GEKO electric heater provides a heating performance between 1,0 kW and 2,0 kW in 3 stages. The heater has an integrated thermostat and an integrated connection cable (L=1,5m).


Product Features



  • 3 Heat settings: 30/1000/2000W

  • Heating element made of stainless steel and copper

  • Adjustable thermostat control

  • Steel frame structure

  • Insulated handle

  • Overheat protection


Technical Data



  • Type: Industrial Fan Heater

  • Power rating: 2kW

  • Input Voltage: 230V / 50Hz

  • Heating performance stage 1: only fan

  • Heating performance stage 2: 1,0 kW

  • Heating performance stage 3: 2,0 kW

  • Heating area: 20m²

  • Air flow rate: up to 186 m3/h

  • Connection cable: integrated L=1,5m

  • Thermostat: integrated

  • Protection type: IPX4

  • Weight: 3,4 kg

  • Thermostat: integrated

  • Protection type: IP24

description.name: Gas Fired Heater/LPG with Reducer 15kW
description.long_desc:
GEKO LPG/Gas heater provides 15kW heating performance. Can heat areas up to 200m³.


Product Features



  • Portable air heater

  • Functions on LPG/Gas

  • Manual Piezo ignition

  • Fan Assisted

  • Insulated handle

  • Over-heat protection

  • Cut-off protection avoid gas leaking


Technical Data



  • Type: Industrial LPG/Gas Heater

  • Power rating: 15kW

  • Input voltage: 220V-240V~50Hz

  • Gas consumption: 0,65 kg/h

  • Gas pressure: 0,7 bar

  • Air output: 320 m³/h

  • Heating area: approx. 200m³

  • Dimensions: 380x190x305mm

  • Certificates: CE, RoHS


Package Contents:



  • 1 x Gas heater

  • 1 x Regulator

  • 1 x 1,5m Hose

  • 1 x Instruction manual

description.name: Oil Fired Direct Heater with Thermostat 25kW
description.long_desc:
GEKO 25kW Oil Fired Direct Heater provides a good and fast way to heat workshops and garages. PC panel to smart setting the target temperature.


Product Features



  • Stainless steel combustion chamber with fan cooling

  • Functions on Diesel Oil/Kerosene

  • Integrated thermostat with a dual display for set value and actual value

  • Over-heat protection

  • Cut-off protection

  • Integrated fuel tank with fuel level display

  • Wheels for easy transportation

  • Working time up to 10 hours


Technical Data



  • Type: Industrial Oil Heater

  • Power rating: 25kW

  • Motor power: 100W

  • Input voltage: 220V-240V~50Hz

  • Fuel consumption: 1,95 L/h

  • Tank capacity: 19L

  • Air output: 650 m³/h

  • Dimensions: 750x315x400mm

  • Certificates: CE, RoHS

  • Weight: 6,1 kg


Package Contents:



  • 1 x Space Heater

  • 1 x Instruction manual

description.name: 2in1 Car Cooling/Heating Fan Heater Defroster 12V 150W
description.long_desc:
Car heater 150W 12V

Optimal power 150W guarantees high performance, with no risk of discharging the battery. The device has two functionsá-hesting and cooling, what makes it perfect for both summer and winter. Because of a fast airflow - heating function will be perfect whenáthe car windows are very steamy or frosted. á

description.name: Portable Camping Gas Stove Butane 2,5 kW
description.long_desc:
GEKO 2,5kW compact and portable single burner camping stove.


Product Features



  • 2500W burner stove

  • Piezo ignition

  • Cartridge safety locking system

  • Non-slip rubber legs

  • Carry case included


Technical Data



  • Power: 2,5 kW

  • Color: Matt Black

  • Dimensions: 34,5 x 28 x 11 cm

  • Gas consumption: 195 grams per hour

  • Cartridge required: CP250 cartridge

description.name: Metal Cut Off Saw 400V 3000W
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Great cutting efficiency

  • Belt Driven Engine

  • Pivoting fence adjusts for straight and up to 45° cuts


Technical Data



  • Power Output: 3000W

  • Input Voltage: 400V, 50Hz

  • Disc Diameter: 400 mm

  • Arbor: 25,4 mm

  • Cutting Adjustment Angle: 0 - 45°

  • No Load Speed at 3000W, 50Hz: 2800 rpm

  • Capacity


    • Bar Diameter: 50 mm

    • Pipe Diameter: 135 x 6 mm

    • Shaped Steel: 110 x 10 mm
